comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Social Documentary Photography & events, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 49010394@N08
comment._content: Farmer cooperatives existed in 1940, with some sort of guidance/assistance from the Farm Security Admnistration (FSA)? Interesting - I don't think the FSA exists anymore; I wonder what became of it.
